INVALID_BOOLEAN: this field is not a boolean
MIN_PASSWORD: password must be longer than or equal to 8 characters
MAX_PASSWORD: password must be shorter than or equal to 50 characters
NEW_PASSWORD_NOT_EMPTY: new password should not be empty
CONFIRM_PASSWORD_NOT_EMPTY: confirm password should not be empty
INVALID_STRING: this field is not a string
INVALID_DATE: this field is not a format datetime
PHONE_NUMBER_MIN: Phone number must be longer than or equal to 10 characters!!!
PHONE_NUMBER_MAX: Phone number must be shorter than or equal to 12 characters!!!
TYPE_BOOLEAN: this field must be a boolean value!!!
PHONE_NUMBER_TYPE_NUMBER_STRING: this field must be a number string value!!!
INVALID_NUMBER: this field is not a number
MIX_ARRAY: Array must have at least one value
INVALID_FILE_NAME: file name must be  from 3 through 63 characters long or  invalid characters
MIX_LENGTH_320: This field must be shorter than or equal to 320 characters
MIX_LENGTH_255: This field must be shorter than or equal to 255 characters
MIN_BRIGHTNESS: The brightness value greater than or equal to 0
MAX_BRIGHTNESS: The brightness value less than or equal to 100
MIN_TONE: The tone value greater than or equal to 2700
MAX_TONE: The tone value less than or equal to 6500
MAX_HOURS: The hours have value less than or equal to 24
MIN_HOURS: The hours value greater than or equal to 0
MIN_MINUTES: The minutes value greater than or equal to 0
MAX_MINUTES: The minutes value less than or equal to 60
MIN_DAY_OF_WEEK: The day of week value greater than or equal to 1
MAX_DAY_OF_WEEK: The day of week value less than or equal to 7
MAX_MONTHS: The months value less than or equal to 12
MIN_MONTHS: The months value greater than or equal to 1
MAX_DATE: The date value less than or equal to 31
MIN_DATE: The date value greater than or equal to 1
MIN_BUTTON_POSITION: The button position value greater than or equal to 0
MAX_BUTTON_POSITION: The button position value is less than or equal to 5
INVALID_OPTION_SENSOR: The option sensor is enum value 'double' or 'single'
NUMBER_GROUP_SENSOR: The sensor is assign with 2 or 1 groups
NUMBER_POSITION_GROUP_SENSOR: The position group of sensor is with 1 or 2
MIN_FADE_IN: The fade in time of sensor value greater than or equal to 0.5
MAX_FADE_IN: The fade in time of sensor value less than or equal to 25.5
MIN_FADE_OUT: The fade out time of sensor value greater than or equal to 0.5
MAX_FADE_OUT: The fade out time of sensor value less than or equal to 25.5
MIN_BRIGHTNESS_RETENTION_TIME: The brightness retention time of sensor value greater than or equal to 1
MAX_BRIGHTNESS_RETENTION_TIME: The brightness retention of sensor value less than or equal to 65.535
MIN_SENSOR_SENSITIVITY: The sensor sensitivity of sensor value greater than or equal to 3
MAX_SENSOR_SENSITIVITY: The sensor sensitivity of sensor value less than or equal to 5
MIN_RECOGNIZING_CYCLE_TIME: The recognizing cycle time of sensor value greater than or equal to 0.5
MAX_RECOGNIZING_CYCLE_TIME: The recognizing cycle time of sensor value less than or equal to 8
MIN_PERCEPTION: The perception of sensor value greater than or equal to 1
MAX_PERCEPTION: The perception of sensor value less than or equal to 100
MIN_NOT_PERCEPTION: The not perception of sensor value greater than or equal to 0
MAX_NOT_PERCEPTION: The not perception of sensor value less than or equal to 99
MIN_LUX_SETTING: The lux setting of sensor value greater than or equal to 100
MAX_LUX_SETTING: The lux setting of sensor value less than or equal to 2000
MIN_DIMMING_SETTING: The dimming setting of sensor value greater than or equal to 0
MAX_DIMMING_SETTING: The dimming setting of sensor value less than or equal to 2
ONE_MASTER_SMART_SENSOR_REGISTER_IN_GROU: One master smart sensor for a group
SMART_SENSOR_NOT_SINGLE: Smart sensor not in option single
INVALID_LIGHTING_STATUS: The lighting status is enum value 'off' or 'on'
